description: If two topics are similar and disconnected, it is possible that there is a missing remap.
query: for c in <configs> let pairs = { for pub in <c/nodes/publishers[self.topic.is_disconnected]>, sub in <c/nodes/subscribers[self.topic.is_disconnected]> where pub.type == sub.type and (pub.topic.id.endswith(sub.topic.name) or sub.topic.id.endswith(pub.topic.name) or pub.rosname.full == sub.rosname.full or pub.rosname.full.endswith(sub.rosname.own) or sub.rosname.full.endswith(pub.rosname.own) or pub.rosname.given == sub.rosname.given) return 'pub':pub, 'sub':sub } where len(pairs) > 0 return c, pairs
name: No Disconnected Similar Topics
